summary.para: Contains types providing the Rich Text Editor support in the Office Module.
Contains values specifying the menu type used by the RichText Property Editor.
The editor uses the bars menu.
The menu type is selected based on the value.
The editor does not use a menu.
Contains values specifying the document storage format used by the RichText Property Editor.
The document is stored in the HTML format.
The document is stored in the RTF format.
Extends the node with properties specifying the RichEdit editor behavior in List Views.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Office.Win.IModelRichTextColumn.CustomHeight

summary.para: Specifies the RichEdit cell height, in pixels.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the editor height, in pixels.

summary.para: Extends the node with properties specifying the RichEdit document storage format.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Office.Win.IModelRichTextFormatSettings.DocumentStorageFormat

summary.para: Specifies the document storage format used by the RichText Property Editor.

member.value: An enumeration value specifying the document storage format used by the RichText Property Editor.

summary.para: Extends the node with properties specifying the RichEdit editor menu behavior.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Office.Win.IModelRichTextPropertyEditorSettings.MenuManagerType

summary.para: Specifies the menu type used by the RichText Property Editor.

member.value: An enumeration value specifying the menu type used by the RichText Property Editor.
